titleStmt.title: A letter from a gentleman to his friend in London in confutation of the scurrilous libell of an anonymus [sic] blackloist [sic], against the reverend and learned P.R. up the occasion of his Latine epistle of the clergie's obedience to the sea apostolick. With an inclosed to the libeller himself.
titleStmt.author: T. R.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Pugh, Robert. De retinenda cleri Anglicani in sedem Apostolicam observantia. Cf. DNB.
Title page is torn, slightly affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
